[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mDuring fuzz testing of the Mongoose codebase’s internal TCP/IP stack, [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAddressSanitizer detected a heap-buffer-overflow in the function `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdefined[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `net_builtin.c` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. A one-byte read occurs immediately past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap allocation when handling an ICMP packet, leading to an out-of-bounds access.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Issue type: Heap-based buffer overflow [0m[1;39m([0m[39mout-of-bounds read[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Trigger: Fuzzer invokes `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` in `mongoose/test/fuzz.c`, which[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocates a packet buffer of [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes and passes it into `mg_tcpip_rx`. Within [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat, `rx_icmp` reads one byte beyond the end of the allocated buffer.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Stack trace highlights:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at `net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m`  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `mg_tcpip_rx` in the same source file at line [0m[1;36m897[0m[39m  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` in `fuzz.[0m[1;92mc:106:5[0m[39m`  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Sanitizer report:[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - The faulty read is at address `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`, exactly one byte past the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated region `[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - The [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region was allocated via `malloc` in `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` at [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`fuzz.[0m[1;92mc:95:17[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Shadow memory shows a heap left redzone [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`fa`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m immediately after the [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocation.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Fuzz harness:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Launches the `fuzz` binary with libFuzzer and AddressSanitizer.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Uses a TestCase file of arbitrary contents to drive `mg_tcpip_rx` through [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp`.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Areas for deeper investigation:[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. The buffer allocation logic in the fuzz harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mongoose/test/fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maround line [0m[1;36m95[0m[39m, to confirm intended buffer size and layout.  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. The implementation of `rx_icmp` in `src/mongoose/src/net_builtin.c` [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mparticularly the code at and around line [0m[1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to identify missing bounds checks [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhen accessing packet data.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. The general packet dispatch and parsing mechanisms in `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mline [0m[1;36m897[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, to understand how packet sizes are validated before passing to [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocol-specific handlers.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Definitions of the `pkt` structure and any related headers or length fields [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat govern buffer boundaries.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m392[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Copy RX payload to TX[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m393[0m[39m:    icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m394[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m395[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m396[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Summary of Root Cause:[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The heap-buffer-overflow arises because `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` unconditionally [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdereferences the ICMP header pointer `pkt->icmp` without verifying that the ICMP [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader lies entirely within the allocated `pkt->raw.buf`.  Under fuzzing, [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.buf` may be smaller than `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` + IP header, so reading [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp->type` overruns by one byte.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Key Constraints & Preservation:[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We must not alter the fuzz harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or any external libraries.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All existing protocol-path logic [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIPv4 dispatch, ICMP echo-reply generation[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmust remain intact for valid packets.[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We avoid over-broad exception catching, don't remove functionality, and only [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39madd bounds checks in the affected source file `src/net_builtin.c`.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Fix Overview:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Tighten ICMP dispatch in `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Compute the precise ICMP header offset relative to the start of [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.buf`.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Verify that the raw buffer length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->raw.len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is at least large enough[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto contain the ICMP header.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Only then assign `pkt->icmp`, call `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` for the post‐header payload, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand invoke `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Harden `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` itself with a defensive preamble:  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - At entry, re-confirm that `pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` lies within the packet’s raw [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer, and early-return if not.  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - This ensures that even if another caller mistakenly invokes `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith an undersized buffer, it still cannot read past the allocation.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Detailed Steps:[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m4.1[0m[39m. In `src/net_builtin.c`, locate the IPv4 handler `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround lines [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m794[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m805[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        - Remove or supplement the existing[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        - Add:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ```c[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Determine ICMP header offset [0m[1;39m([0m[39mafter IP header[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m              If struct ip has variable IHL fields, use them; else assume [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m*[0m[35m/[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           size_t ihl = [0m[35m/[0m[39m* e.g. [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           uint8_t *base = pkt->raw.buf;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           uint8_t *end  = base + pkt->raw.len;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           uint8_t *icmp_hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ihl;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Ensure ICMP header is fully contained within the raw buffer: *[0m[35m/[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           if [0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp_hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Safe to set the ICMP pointer and compute payload: *[0m[35m/[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m icmp_hdr;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, icmp_hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           ```[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        - Remove reliance on `pkt->pay.len` alone, since it reflects only “data [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mafter whatever mkpay saw” and can underflow/overflow if `mkpay` runs on a bad `p`.[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m4.2[0m[39m. In `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround lines [0m[1;36m382[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m386[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, add a guard at the very top:[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```c[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          uint8_t *base = pkt->raw.buf;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          uint8_t *end  = base + pkt->raw.len;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          uint8_t *icmp_hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->icmp;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Defensive check: ensure the ICMP header can be read safely *[0m[35m/[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          if [0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp_hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Existing logic follows: *[0m[35m/[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            [0m[33m...[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        ```[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - This prevents any out-of-bounds read of `pkt->icmp->type`.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Justification:[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Safety**: We explicitly check buffer bounds before any dereference of [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp`, eliminating the AddressSanitizer heap-buffer-overflow.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Minimal Intrusion**: Only two small code blocks are added in [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`net_builtin.c`. All other ICMP logic [0m[1;39m([0m[39mecho reply, checksum, payload copy[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remains [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muntouched.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Fuzz Harness Compatibility**: We do not modify `fuzz.c` or any harness code.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe protocol‐stack functions will simply drop malformed/truncated ICMP packets, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwhich is acceptable behavior.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **No Broad Catching**: We early-return on bad packets, rather than catching [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mgeneric errors that might mask other bugs.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Precedent**: Similar bounds checks exist in `rx_udp` and `rx_tcp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthey [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcompare `pkt->pay.len` to `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->tcp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but we need [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexplicit raw‐buffer checks here because `mkpay` can be misled if the header pointer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis out of bounds.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Potential Side Effects & Mitigation:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Dropping Short ICMP Packets**: Valid but unusual ICMP packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., IP [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptions altering header length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m will still be accepted as long as `ihl` is computed[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrectly. If `struct ip` supports options, replace the hardcoded `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` with the IHL-derived length.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Performance**: Two pointer comparisons per packet are negligible relative to[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnetwork-stack processing.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Future Maintenance**: Developers should apply the same defensive pattern to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39many new protocol dissectors added to `net_builtin.c`.[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. Verification:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Run existing unit tests for Mongoose to confirm no regressions.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Re-run the fuzz harness under AddressSanitizer; the previous [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow in `rx_icmp` must no longer trigger.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Confirm that well-formed ICMP echo requests still elicit echo replies [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msuccessfully.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/27/25 12:59:31][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=810100;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=49421;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m[12/27/25 13:00:55][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m [1m[[0mlogging_performance[1m][0m[1m([0mmongoose Setting owner[1m)[0m Took [1;36m0.92[0m seconds;              ]8;id=136153;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py\[2mcontext_managers.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=774369;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py#23\[2m23[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [33mexception[0m=[3;91mFalse[0m                                                               [2m                      [0m
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m [1m[[0mlogging_performance[1m][0m[1m([0mmongoose Patching[1m)[0m Started[33m...[0m                            ]8;id=981939;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py\[2mcontext_managers.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=44463;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/commons/logging/context_managers.py#9\[2m9[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m              size_t hlen = [1;35msizeof[0m[1m([0mstruct eth[1m)[0m + [1;35msizeof[0m[1m([0mstruct ip[1m)[0m + [1;35msizeof[0m[1m([0mstruct icmp[1m)[0m;    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m              size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         @@ [1;36m-799[0m,[1;36m9[0m +[1;36m805[0m,[1;36m13[0m @@                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m              struct mg_connection *c = [1;35mgetpeer[0m[1m([0mifp->mgr, pkt, false[1m)[0m;                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m              if [1m([0mc[1m)[0m [1;35mmg_error[0m[1m([0mc, [32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1m)[0m;                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m            [1m}[0m else if [1m([0mpkt->ip->proto == [1;36m1[0m[1m)[0m [1m{[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -    pkt->icmp = [1m([0mstruct icmp *[1m)[0m [1m([0mpkt->ip + [1;36m1[0m[1m)[0m;                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         -    if [1m([0mpkt->pay.len [1m<[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    size_t ip_hlen   = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp_hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, icmp_hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer report shows a heap-buffer-overflow in function `rx_icmp` [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when the fuzzer feeds a crafted input. The overflow occurs at a[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mread of one byte immediately past the end of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap allocation. A patch was[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mapplied that adds bounds checks before interpreting or invoking `pkt->icmp`, both [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat the start of `rx_icmp` and in the ICMP-parsing branch of `mg_tcpip_rx`. However,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mafter rebuilding and rerunning the fuzzer, the same overflow is still reported at [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe same location in `rx_icmp`.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Result  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   After rebuilding with those checks, the fuzzer run is repeated [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`run_fuzzer fuzz[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and terminates with the same sanitizer error:[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ERROR: AddressSanitizer: heap-buffer-overflow [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m in rx_icmp[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[33m...[0m[39m READ of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m [0m[33m...[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Summary: AddressSanitizer: heap-buffer-overflow [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m in rx_icmp[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   ```[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   The allocation and crash addresses, stack trace, and region size are identical [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto the initial log, indicating the overflow in `rx_icmp` was not prevented by the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39madded checks.[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Areas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The code paths leading up to `pkt->raw.len` and the memory layout of [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.buf`.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How `pkt->icmp` is initialized for non-ICMP packets or after early returns.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any alternate offsets or payload interpretations in `rx_icmp` beyond the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msimple header check.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The correctness of `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` adjustments and whether they affect [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubsequent parsing.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Recompute the ICMP header pointer using the actual IP header length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m rather[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthan assuming a fixed [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m B `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. This ensures that we honor any IP [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptions and that the ICMP header truly resides within [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m..pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. In the IPv4 dispatch [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `mg_tcpip_rx` or its helper `rx_ip`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, replace the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlines:[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   with:[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Compute IP header length from IHL in [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m-bit words[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      size_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      uint8_t *base    = pkt->raw.buf;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      uint8_t *end     = base + pkt->raw.len;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      uint8_t *icmphdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Bounds-check the ICMP header[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39micmphdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39micmphdr;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set the payload pointer to immediately after the ICMP header[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, icmphdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   This honors IP options and guards against heap-buffer overflow when reading any [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP header fields inside `rx_icmp`.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Retain the protective check in `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39madded in the last patch attempt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdouble-check the ICMP header still lies within bounds. However, since we now [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcompute `pkt->icmp` correctly, the original check is sufficient:[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        uint8_t *base     = pkt->raw.buf;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        uint8_t *end      = base + pkt->raw.len;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        uint8_t *icmp_hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp_hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Do not modify any harness or fuzzing logic. All changes are confined to [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/net_builtin.c`, preserving existing tests and fuzzing behavior.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. After applying these changes, re-run the fuzzer. The new bounds checks driven by[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe true IP header length should prevent the one-byte read past the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocation, resolving the AddressSanitizer error in `rx_icmp`.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mJustification:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The core overflow is caused by misaligned `pkt->icmp` when IP options are present[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor an IHL > [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m; using `pkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m` assumes a fixed [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m B header, leading to reading [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbeyond the packet payload.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Computing `ip_hlen` from the IHL field [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m aligns with [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstandard IP parsing logic elsewhere in the code.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The two-tier bounds checks [0m[1;39m([0m[39monce at header parsing, once at `rx_icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m guarantee [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msafety without hiding other bugs.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- We preserve the error path [0m[1;39m([0m[39mearly return[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m if packets are too small, maintaining [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexisting behavior for non-ICMP or truncated packets.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- This approach mirrors similar fixes in the UDP/TCP dispatch where offsets depend [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mon header lengths, ensuring consistency across protocols.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/27/25 13:01:19][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=91959;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=595219;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/out/[0m[95mfuzz[0m[39m: Running [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m inputs [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[1;35mtime[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m each.[0m                                        [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mRunning: [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m=================================================================[0m                    [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ERROR: AddressSanitizer: heap-buffer-overflow on address [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m at pc [0m [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x556a83f26c02[0m[39m bp [0m[1;36m0x7ffe5843aba0[0m[39m sp [0m[1;36m0x7ffe5843ab98[0m                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mREAD of size [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m at [0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m thread T0[0m                                           [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mSCARINESS: [0m[1;36m12[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte-read-heap-buffer-overflow[0m[1;39m)[0m                                     [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Poisoned by user:        f7[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Container overflow:      fc[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Array cookie:            ac[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Intra object redzone:    bb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp568dssp9[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe codebase under test is a networking stack component [0m[1;39m([0m[39m“mongoose”[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m exercised by a[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz harness. The initial issue is an AddressSanitizer-detected [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow in the function `rx_icmp`, triggered during fuzzer execution. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch was applied to add explicit bounds checks both inside `rx_icmp` and in the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP dispatch path [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m before computing `pkt->icmp`. After [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrebuilding and rerunning the same fuzz input [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m times, the overflow remains at the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame location in `rx_icmp`, indicating that the patch did not prevent the [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout-of-bounds read.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A fuzz run [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`-[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m consistently triggers a heap-buffer-overflow in the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at source line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m in `src/net_builtin.c`.  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- ASan reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read just past the end of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap allocation [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m` – `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The faulty read occurs at `icmp_hdr + [0m[1;35moffsetof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp, [0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, indicating an [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mincorrect or absent boundary check before accessing the ICMP header.  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Stack trace highlights:  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m `rx_icmp`  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m `mg_tcpip_rx`  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` in `mongoose/test/fuzz.c`  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Around line [0m[1;36m383[0m[39m in `src/net_builtin.c`, a new block was added at the top of [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp`:  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```c[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    uint8_t *base     = pkt->raw.buf;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    uint8_t *end      = base + pkt->raw.len;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    uint8_t *icmp_hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp_hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the IP proto-[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m797[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the code was changed from:  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```c[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  to:  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```c[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    size_t ip_hlen     = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    uint8_t *base      = pkt->raw.buf;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    uint8_t *end       = base + pkt->raw.len;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    uint8_t *icmp_hdr  = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp_hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39micmp_hdr;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, icmp_hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ```[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Result  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzz runner was rebuilt and invoked in the same configuration.  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The same AddressSanitizer heap-buffer-overflow crash occurs at `rx_icmp` line [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m, with identical stack trace and shadow memory map.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The overflow still reads one byte beyond the allocated packet buffer, so the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39madded checks did not intercept this particular bad input.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFurther Investigation  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The disjoint between the allocation size [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->raw.len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and how/when [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp` is computed suggests multiple code paths may set or adjust `pkt->icmp` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mincorrectly.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The boundary check in `rx_icmp` uses `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` but the function [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccesses additional fields beyond the header size; the true required bounds may be [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlarger.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The interaction of `mkpay`, `pkt->pay.len`, and how `mg_tcpip_rx` fragments or [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreassembles packets should be reviewed.  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Any other protocol branches [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., UDP, TCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that manipulate `pkt->raw`, [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->ip`, `pkt->icmp`, or `pkt->pay` deserve a holistic audit to ensure consistent[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength validation prior to header access.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
