[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m795[0m[39m:  uint16_t frag = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->frag[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m796[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m797[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m798[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:379[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m390[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m379[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m380[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m381[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:800[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m810[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m807[0m[39m:    pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m808[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m809[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->udp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m810[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mMG_VERBOSE[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"UDP %M:%hu -> %M:%hu len %u"[0m[39m, mg_print_ip4, &pkt->ip->src,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The AddressSanitizer reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte overflow in rx_icmp reading past the end[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte packet buffer.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The last patch correctly adjusts the ICMP pointer in rx_ip for variable-length[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIP headers, and adds a coarse bounds check in rx_icmp requiring only [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` bytes.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - However, rx_icmp reads not only the fixed ICMP header [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtype, code, checksum[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbut also additional fields [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., echo request “id”[0m[35m/[0m[39m“seq” words and possibly [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Thus a check against just `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is insufficient.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Moreover, while [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m sets `pkt->pay.buf` and `pkt->pay.len` based on the [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpost-header payload, rx_icmp performs no check that accesses into payload are still[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithin the raw buffer.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Critical Logic to Preserve[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The dynamic IP header length calculation in rx_ip must remain [0m[1;39m([0m[39musing `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mver & [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m should continue to set up `pkt->pay` as before; we do not modify [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload setup.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The ICMP dispatch path must still reject undersized packets early to avoid [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdeeper code changes.[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Proposed Patch Outline[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Enhance rx_ip ICMP dispatch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mreapply from last patch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Compute `ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`, then locate `icmp_hdr = [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen`.[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Verify `icmp_hdr + minimum_icmp_header_size <= pkt->raw.buf + [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->raw.len`.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Assign `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39micmp_hdr`, call `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, icmp_hdr + [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mminimum_icmp_header_size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, then invoke rx_icmp.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. In rx_icmp, perform a **full buffer boundary check** covering:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m The fixed ICMP header [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtype, code, checksum[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m If `type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mecho request[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m-byte “identifier/sequence” fields.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m3[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Any reference to payload bytes via `pkt->pay.len`.[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Compute:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          base = pkt->raw.buf;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          end  = base + pkt->raw.len;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          icmp_hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Determine `header_plus_req = icmp_hdr + offsetof_end_of_access;`[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        where `offsetof_end_of_access = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` *or* a constant [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcapturing additional id/seq bytes if they live outside the struct.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Then require `header_plus_req + pkt->pay.len <= end`.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - If this test fails, return immediately.[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. Replace the existing single check [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`icmp_hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrx_icmp with the above two-stage check:[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Always ensure at least the minimal ICMP header is present:[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            if [0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp_hdr + ICMP_HDR_MIN <= end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m else return;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. If we will access id/seq or payload, ensure those are in-bounds:[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            if [0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp_hdr + ICMP_HDR_FULL + pkt->pay.len > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Step-by-Step Implementation[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - At the top of `rx_ip` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines ~[0m[1;36m801[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m805[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, reapply the dynamic IP header patch:[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     a. Compute `ip_hlen` from `pkt->ip->ver`.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     b. Derive `icmp_hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen`.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     c. Check `icmp_hdr + ICMP_HDR_MIN <= raw.buf + raw.len`; return if not.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     d. Set `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39micmp_hdr; [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlines ~[0m[1;36m380[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m390[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, remove or replace the existing lambda checking [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39monly `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. Instead:[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     a. Define `uint8_t *hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp;`[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     b. `uint8_t *end = pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len;`[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     c. `size_t min_hdr = [0m[1;35moffsetof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp, data[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m up to checksum, type, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     d. `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhdr + min_hdr > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     e. If `pkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m`, set `size_t full_hdr = min_hdr + [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;`  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m-byte [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mid/seq[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        else `full_hdr = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     f. If `hdr + full_hdr > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     g. Finally, ensure payload access:  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           `uint8_t *pay_end = hdr + full_hdr + pkt->pay.len;`  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpay_end > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Justification[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This strategy precisely bounds all subsequent reads in rx_icmp: fixed header, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptional id/seq, and payload.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - It retains the existing dynamic IP-length logic in rx_ip and does not alter [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or fuzz harnesses.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By splitting the checks, we avoid over-broad returns that might drop valid [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpackets, since we only reject truly truncated or corrupted inputs.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The check expressions are simple pointer arithmetic—no new dependencies or [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mutility functions.[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similar patterns are already used in UDP/TCP branches [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., verifying [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->udp` pointer + `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` ≤ buffer end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, so this aligns with [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexisting code style.[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Potential Side-Effects & Mitigation[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Over-restrictive checks might skip malformed but interesting ICMP packets; [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhowever, the fuzz harness will still explore valid code paths.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No performance regression: just two or three pointer comparisons.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All existing tests [0m[1;39m([0m[39munit or integration[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m exercise valid ICMP packets and [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshould continue to pass, since their buffers are well-formed.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. References[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The UDP path in `rx_ip`:  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similar multi-stage checks in TCP reassembly code.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - RFC-compliant ICMP parsing requires [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m-byte headers + optional data, per [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m[[0m[39mICMPv4 spec[0m[1;39m][0m[39m.[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:379[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m390[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code_range>src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:800[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m810[0m[39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_range[0m[39m>[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp568dssp9[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer heap-buffer-overflow was detected in the function `rx_icmp` of [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/net_builtin.c` while running a libFuzzer harness. The overflow occurs when [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreading one byte past the end of a small packet buffer allocated in the fuzzing [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtest [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->raw.buf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. A patch was applied that adds explicit bounds checks for the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP header and payload both in `rx_icmp` and in the ICMP‐parsing branch of [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx`. After re-running the fuzzer, the same overflow at the same location [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpersists, indicating the patch did not prevent the out-of-bounds read.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer invokes `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`, which allocates a small packet [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`malloc` of [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and populates a `pkt` structure.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfor `pkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, `pkt->icmp` is set by casting [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` without verifying buffer bounds, and `mkpay` [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcomputes the payload.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- `rx_icmp` then dereferences `pkt->icmp->type` and accesses subsequent bytes, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcausing a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read just past the allocated [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region [0m[1;39m([0m[39mASan reports the bad [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maddress is exactly at the end of the region[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Stack trace highlights the overflow at `[0m[35m/src/mongoose/src/[0m[95mnet_builtin.c[0m[39m:[0m[1;92m385:18[0m[39m` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minside `rx_icmp`.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `rx_icmp`, the patch introduces:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `uint8_t *base = pkt->raw.buf;`  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `uint8_t *end  = base + pkt->raw.len;`  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `uint8_t *hdr  = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp;`  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • A check `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • A check `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + pkt->pay.len > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the `mg_tcpip_rx` branch for ICMP [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, it replaces the raw[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcast with:[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Calculation of `ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • `icmp_hdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen;`  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • A bounds check `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp_hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;`  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Assignment `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39micmp_hdr;` followed by `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39micmp_hdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch result  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Re-running the fuzzer shows the very same ASan error at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m in `rx_icmp`. [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe crash location, allocation site, and overflow offset [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes past the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m remain unchanged. This indicates that either:[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The new checks are not being reached on the crashing code path  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The values of `pkt->raw.len`, `pkt->pay.len`, or the computed `hdr`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`icmp_hdr` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstill allow the out‐of‐bounds access to slip past the checks[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for further investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Computation and origin of `pkt->raw.len` and `pkt->pay.len` in the fuzzing [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mharness  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The logic in `mkpay` and how it sets `pkt->pay.len` relative to `raw.len`  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Exact definition, size, and alignment of `struct icmp` and how it relates to the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mraw packet layout  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The code path in `mg_tcpip_rx` that prepares `pkt->raw.buf`, `pkt->ip`, and [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfragmentation before handing off to `rx_icmp`  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Any alternative parsing branches [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., when `pkt->ip->proto` is not [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that may [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstill call `rx_icmp` without the new checks  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA holistic audit of all code that builds the packet buffer, parses headers, assigns[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp`, and computes payload lengths is recommended to understand why the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbounds checks are not preventing the overflow.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:854[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m861[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m854[0m[39m:void [0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, void *buf, size_t len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m855[0m[39m:  struct pkt pkt;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m856[0m[39m:  [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m857[0m[39m:  pkt.raw.buf = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m858[0m[39m:  pkt.raw.len = len;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m859[0m[39m:  pkt.eth = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m buf;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m860[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_hexdump[0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuf, len > [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m ? [0m[1;36m16[0m[39m: len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m861[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated - runt?[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:887[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m893[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m887[0m[39m:      pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m888[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:794[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m805[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m794[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m795[0m[39m:  uint16_t frag = [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->frag[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m796[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfrag & IP_MORE_FRAGS_MSK || frag & IP_FRAG_OFFSET_MSK[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m797[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->udp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct udp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m798[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:379[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m390[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m379[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m380[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m381[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root-Cause Analysis[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The crash occurs in rx_icmp when reading `pkt->icmp->type`, indicating [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp` points past the end of the allocated buffer.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The last patch placed bounds checks in both the ICMP‐parsing branch of [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich calls rx_icmp directly[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and at the start of `rx_icmp`. Despite[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthis, the overflow persists:[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The condition `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mhdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;` uses “> end” [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mrather than “> end ‐‐ [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m” and thus allows the header to begin at exactly `end - [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, but reading `hdr[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` is safe in that case. However the fuzzer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mshows a [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m‐byte overflow at the very end of the buffer, so in practice `pkt->icmp` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmust sometimes be set to `end` itself [0m[1;39m([0m[39mraw.buf+raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, bypassing the patch’s [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcheck entirely.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • This can happen if `pkt->pay.len` underflows in `mkpay` because its input [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointer `p` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor the raw cast `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m lay beyond `raw.buf + raw.len`. In [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mother words, the upstream pointer arithmetic allowed `pkt->icmp` to be assigned out[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mof bounds, then the header‐size check in `mg_tcpip_rx` passed [0m[1;39m([0m[39mheader size test [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39malone[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and arrived unchanged at rx_icmp.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Critical point: We must ensure BOTH the computed `pkt->icmp` pointer AND the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload pointer returned by `mkpay` are always within the `[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mraw.buf, raw.buf + [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mraw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` region _before_ any dereference in rx_ip or rx_icmp.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Strategy to Fix[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA. Tighten Pointer Validation in ICMP‐Parsing Branch of mg_tcpip_rx[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Compute:[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        uint8_t *start = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        uint8_t *hdr_end = start + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      and immediately verify:[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstart < [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->raw.buf ||[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            hdr_end > [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m header not fully contained[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Only after passing this test assign:[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mstart;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Call mkpay using a _clamped_ pointer:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        uint8_t *pay_start = start + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpay_start > [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pay_start[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      This prevents `p` from ever pointing past the buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39mavoiding mkpay [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munderflow[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mB. Strengthen rx_icmp Entry Validation [0m[1;39m([0m[39mDefensive[0m[1;39m)[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. At the top of rx_icmp, re‐validate:[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        uint8_t *base = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->raw.buf;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        uint8_t *end = base + pkt->raw.len;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        uint8_t *ihdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihdr < base || ihdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Now safe to read type[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Compute `payload_start = ihdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, then:[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpayload_start > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpayload_start + pkt->pay.len > end[0m[1;39m)[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mend - payload_start[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   This ensures `pkt->pay.len` is clamped to the remaining bytes and prevents any [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mout‐of‐bounds read or write in the remainder of rx_icmp.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Preserve Existing Logic[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The checks only _early‐return_ on malformed or truncated packets; they do not [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39malter the valid‐packet path.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- mkpay still correctly computes the payload length for in‐bounds data.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The echo‐reply logic in rx_icmp remains unchanged once pointers are validated.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Side‐Effects & Mitigations[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Valid ICMP echo messages unaffected; only malformed or truncated packets are [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msilently dropped.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No changes to harness, fuzzing logic, or external dependencies.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No broad exception swallowing; checks are precise pointer comparisons.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Similar pattern exists for UDP/TCP parsing; if desired, the same [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mclamp‐and‐validate approach can be applied for consistency.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Implementation Steps[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `mg_tcpip_rx` ICMP branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnot in rx_ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, replace the raw cast + mkpay bloc [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwith the “start/hdr_end” checks, assignment, and clamped mkpay.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `rx_icmp`, replace the existing two‐line >end checks with the stricter `< [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbase`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`> end` checks, then clamp `pkt->pay.len`.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Compile and rerun libFuzzer to confirm that no heap‐buffer‐overflow can occur at [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe old site [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis unified approach seals off both the header parsing site and the rx_icmp [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mhandler against any pointer arithmetic that could slip past the prior >end checks, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfully resolving the ASan‐reported overflow.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
