[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Addressable:           [0m[1;36m00[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Partially addressable: [0m[1;36m01[0m[39m [0m[1;36m02[0m[39m [0m[1;36m03[0m[39m [0m[1;36m04[0m[39m [0m[1;36m05[0m[39m [0m[1;36m06[0m[39m [0m[1;36m07[0m[39m [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Heap left redzone:       fa[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Freed heap region:       fd[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack left redzone:      f1[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack mid redzone:       f2[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack right redzone:     f3[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack after return:      f5[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack use after scope:   f8[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Global redzone:          f9[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Global init order:       f6[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Poisoned by user:        f7[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Container overflow:      fc[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Array cookie:            ac[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Intra object redzone:    bb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp568dssp9[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe initial issue is an AddressSanitizer-reported heap-buffer-overflow in the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. During fuzz testing, the code [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mattempts to read one byte past the end of an allocated buffer when processing an [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP packet.  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch was applied that adds explicit bounds checks and payload-length clamping:[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, it computes `base`, `end`, and `ihdr` pointers and returns early [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mif the ICMP header or payload would lie outside the buffer.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the IP receive path [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_tcpip_rx`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, it similarly validates the ICMP header [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mposition and clamps payload length before calling `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter rebuilding with these changes, the same heap-buffer-overflow is still [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtriggered at the same location in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. The failure log remains an [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moff‐by‐one read of `pkt->icmp` at offset zero beyond the allocated [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte region.[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Fuzzer execution hits an AddressSanitizer error in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The crash stack shows a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m‐byte read at address `[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m172[0m[39m`, which is exactly [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mone byte past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap allocation.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The offending read is at the line that inspects `pkt->icmp->type`, indicating [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat `pkt->icmp` points outside the valid buffer.  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Inputs are allocated by `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` and passed through [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx` to `rx_icmp`.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In `static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` around line [0m[1;36m380[0m[39m, the patch inserts:[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     uint8_t *base = pkt->raw.buf;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     uint8_t *end  = base + pkt->raw.len;[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     uint8_t *ihdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->icmp;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihdr < base || ihdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m clamp pkt->pay.len to [0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, end - [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m][0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In the IP-proto-[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m branch [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m799[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, it replaces the simplistic pointer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39marithmetic with:[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     uint8_t *base = pkt->raw.buf, *end = base + pkt->raw.len;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     uint8_t *start = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstart < base || start + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mstart;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m compute & clamp payload, then call [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - These changes are intended to prevent any out‐of‐bounds access of `pkt->icmp` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor its payload.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Result  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - After rebuilding and running the fuzzer for [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m iterations, the same ASan [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreport appears.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The crash site remains in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at the read of `pkt->icmp->type`.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The address and allocation details match the original failure, indicating the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbounds checks did not prevent this particular overflow.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Areas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The computation and propagation of `pkt->icmp` and `pkt->raw.len` across the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreceive path.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The ordering of header-pointer assignments and length fields inside [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, especially for fragmented or malformed ICMP packets.  [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any other code paths that set `pkt->icmp` without updating `pkt->raw.len` or [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvice versa.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The interaction between `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpayload setup[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and the code in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis review confirms that although explicit pointer bounds checks were added, the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munderlying condition that places `pkt->icmp` just beyond the valid buffer is still [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpossible. A more thorough audit of the entire packet‐parsing logic is needed to [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfully prevent out-of-bounds reads.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -f [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/dev/[0m[95mnull[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO: Running with entropic power schedule [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0xFF[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/out/[0m[95mfuzz[0m[39m: Running [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m inputs [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[1;35mtime[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m each.[0m                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m0x5611a2713c02[0m[39m bp [0m[1;36m0x7ffe3dd34d20[0m[39m sp [0m[1;36m0x7ffe3dd34d18[0m                                  [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Overview  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   The root cause is that `pkt->raw.len` is overwritten by the untrusted IPv4 [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader length without clamping to the actual buffer size, and the IPv4 IHL [0m[1;39m([0m[39mheader [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m path doesn’t validate `ip_hlen` before calling `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` or before [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39massigning `pkt->icmp`. This allows `pkt->pay.len` to be spuriously large, so that [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdownstream ICMP code reads just past the real buffer. The correct approach is to:[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Clamp `pkt->raw.len` to the original input length immediately after reading [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`ip->len`.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Rigorously validate `ip_hlen` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m against the clamped `raw.len` before [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minvoking `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. In the ICMP handler [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip` for `[0m[33mproto[0m[39m==[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, compute the ICMP header pointer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvia `ip_hlen`, bounds‐check it against `pkt->raw.buf/len`, and then clamp the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Steps  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. In `[0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround lines [0m[1;36m882[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m893[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Save the original buffer length at entry to the IPv4 branch:  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          `size_t orig_len = pkt.raw.len;`  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Compute the total IP packet length and clamp:  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ```[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          size_t ip_tot = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          pkt.raw.len = ip_tot < orig_len ? ip_tot : orig_len;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ```  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Keep the existing “truncated” sanity checks for `raw.len < [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m+[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` etc.  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Unify the IHL handling into one validated path:  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ```[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          size_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip_hlen < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ||[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m              [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen > pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Invalid or truncated IP header+options[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            return;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, &pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ```  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       This replaces the old `if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL>[0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[35m/[0m[95melse[0m[39m` and ensures no out‐of‐bounds mkpay. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. In `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe ICMP branch around lines [0m[1;36m801[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m805[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Replace the simplistic  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ```[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ```  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        with a robust IHL‐based version:  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ```[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          uint8_t *base = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->raw.buf;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          uint8_t *end  = base + pkt->raw.len;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          size_t  ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          uint8_t *ihdr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39muint8_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->ip + ip_hlen;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Ensure full ICMP header fits[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihdr < base + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ||[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m              ihdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m            return;[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mihdr;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Compute & clamp payload[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          uint8_t *pstart = ihdr + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          size_t   available = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpstart > end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ? [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m : [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mend - pstart[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          pkt->pay.ptr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpstart;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          pkt->pay.len = available;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m          ```  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       This guarantees `pkt->icmp` and its payload never lie outside the real [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. [0m[1;39m([0m[39mOptional[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Tighten `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to refuse out‐of‐bounds pointers:  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     Inside `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, you may add an early guard:  [0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp < pkt->raw.buf ||[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mp > pkt->raw.buf + pkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       pkt->pay.len = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       pkt->pay.ptr = NULL;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       return;[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     This further isolates any misuse, though the above upstream checks render it [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mredundant.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Clamping `pkt->raw.len` ensures no later code “sees” more bytes than [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mphysically exist.  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Validating `ip_hlen` blocks malformed or option‐heavy packets from triggering [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointer arithmetic beyond the buffer.  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - IHL‐based ICMP header setup in `[0m[1;35mrx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` exactly matches how valid packets are[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlaid out.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The ICMP‐path checks preserve existing logic [0m[1;39m([0m[39mreply to echo‐request type [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcorrect payload slicing[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m while closing the [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m‐byte overrun.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Side Effects & Mitigation  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Malformed/oversized IP packets will now be silently dropped rather than [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprocessed; this is acceptable since they were already “truncated” by the TCP/IP [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstack.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Unit and fuzzer tests for valid ICMP echo requests remain unchanged.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No external or harness code is touched; fuzz‐triggering paths and tests still [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdrive the same code.[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Reference & Similar Patterns  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The IPv6 parser in the same file clamps lengths and validates header [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mextensions before payload extraction—adopted here for IPv4.  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The post‐IP hop‐limit logic already enforces pointer bounds before deep [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparsing; our patch aligns ICMP similarly.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mWith these changes, `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` can no longer read beyond the heap allocation, and [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe ASan fuzzer reports for the [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte buffer will disappear.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/27/25 13:11:01][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.END                      ]8;id=286506;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=791992;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [1m([0mn evals: [1;36m6[0m, patch status: PatchStatus.VULNERABLE[1m)[0m                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Building environment                                                                 ]8;id=436054;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/context_builder/services/aixcc/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=337741;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/context_builder/services/aixcc/__init__.py#132\[2m132[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         - Cache directory: [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmp83tqfc11[0m                                                  [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         - Max timeout: [1;36m1800[0m                                                                  [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         - Output directory:                                                                  [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/reports/prism.prism_o4_mini/mongoose_mg-delta-02_mongoose_2/[0m[95magent-o[0m [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [95mutput-1766841061.3961153[0m                                                             [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         - Detection toml file:                                                               [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         scripts/benchmark/afc-no-delta/mongoose_mg-delta-02_mongoose_2.toml                  [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         - Challenge project directory: [35m/home/qqor/crete/.cache/[0m[95mofficial-afc-mongoose[0m         [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                              [2m               [0m
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Deleting environments directory: [35m/home/qqor/crete/.cache/environments/[0m[95mmongoose[0m       ]8;id=773886;file:///home/qqor/crete/scripts/benchmark/__main__.py\[2m__main__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=244896;file:///home/qqor/crete/scripts/benchmark/__main__.py#300\[2m300[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Deleted work directory:                                                              ]8;id=874865;file:///home/qqor/crete/scripts/benchmark/__main__.py\[2m__main__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=5248;file:///home/qqor/crete/scripts/benchmark/__main__.py#309\[2m309[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/work/[0m[95mmongoose[0m              [2m               [0m
[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Deleted out directory:                                                               ]8;id=593719;file:///home/qqor/crete/scripts/benchmark/__main__.py\[2m__main__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=787762;file:///home/qqor/crete/scripts/benchmark/__main__.py#312\[2m312[0m]8;;\
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m               [2m               [0m
